words.meaning: Bir şeyi başarıyla tamamlamak veya gerçekleştirmek
examples: She accomplished all her goals for the year.
The team accomplished the project ahead of schedule.

words.definition: to improve the quality or value of something
words.meaning: Bir şeyin kalitesini veya değerini artırmak
examples: The new features will enhance the user experience.
Regular exercise can enhance your overall health.

words.definition: to continue firmly in an opinion or course of action
words.meaning: Bir düşünce veya eylemde kararlılıkla devam etmek
examples: If you persist in your efforts, you will succeed.
The problem persisted despite our attempts to fix it.

words.definition: to discuss something to reach an agreement
words.meaning: Bir anlaşmaya varmak için görüşmek veya tartışmak
examples: They are negotiating the terms of the contract.
We successfully negotiated a better price.

words.definition: to give a particular job or responsibility to someone else
words.meaning: Belirli bir işi veya sorumluluğu başka birine devretmek
examples: A good manager knows how to delegate tasks effectively.
She delegated the project to her assistant.

words.definition: to work jointly with others on an activity or project
words.meaning: Bir aktivite veya proje üzerinde başkalarıyla birlikte çalışmak
examples: The two teams collaborated on the research project.
Artists often collaborate with other musicians.
